```
import qualified Control.Exception as E

example1 :: Float -> Float -> IO ()
example1 x y =
  E.catch (putStrLn (show (myDiv1 x y)))
          (\(ErrorCall e) -> putStrLn e)
```

```
-- Prior to base-4.3

Loading package mtl-1.1.0.2 ... linking ... done.

-- After base-4.3

*** Exception: foo
```
